cab.content: " * ' .Circulated by the Secretary of State for India. SECRET.From Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, 24th September 1917.(Received at India Office, 7 a.m., 25th.)Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet except for raid at Mardau, in which Patwari was wounded and considerable property looted. No change in the general military situation in India or Afghanistan.
